reviewText: Oh my, what a movie. I am a big fan of Miss Della Reese. I love her to death. This is one movie everyone should see. Love the movie, and sensitive subject. A family movie. Its about a young white girl, growning up in poverty. Ms. Della Reese steps in with her husband "To Tall" played by Civil Rights Activist, Ossie Davis. Great Acting, Great Movie. A must see also!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Title: Chasing Secrets

reviewerName: Modern Blue Argonaut "No I do not have a shoe...
reviewText: In this day and age when there are so many angry young youths and spoiled rotten youths this movie can help bring into focus what is important and also help to show the youth that their hardships are not as great as they may seem. The movie is set in the depression era in rural Tennessee before civil rights. It shows racism and the hardships faced by a poor uneducated white family and a poor black family. Lack of food and education are central as well as domestic violence and prostition although the prostition part is tastefully depicted and should not upset or concern younger children. Whether or not you have faced these hardships yourself you should be able to relate to the characters and their problems and feel their pain. This is a wonderfully directed movie with a rich landscape of authenticity. I highly recommend this movie for anyone with a heart and those who are searching for one.
summary: Excellent movie in this day & age
Title: Chasing Secrets

reviewText: This was not a movie that I liked because of the racial slurs in it.  The people in the movie were good actors I just didn't like the content.
Title: Chasing Secrets

reviewText: I got the dvd looks good I started watching the movie and played good but somewhere in the middle the dvd stopped and skiped ahead I have another dvd player so I tryed it in that one but same thing happened. I tryed to clean dvd and play but same thing it skiped. I went into scene seletion and tryed to fast foward and rewind through the scene where it skiped. I was able to rewind it then try to watch it but it still would stop and skip the scene. so I gave up and just watched rest of the movie but I miss about 20 mins in the middle of the movie. Not what I like to see only part of it.
Title: Chasing Secrets

reviewText: This is a very good movie! A definite must see movie! I highly recommend it! It is about a woman who overhears her uppity, teenage daughter, making fun of this poor girl in school, and the woman decides to teach her daughter a lesson that she will never forget!The daughter begins to  learn things about her mother, and her mother's past that she never knew! The mother takes her to a place that holds unhappy memories, for her mother, and also tells her daughter about a wonderful loving, black couple that saved her life! This is a heartrending, and heartwarming, awesome story!This is a story about a very remarkable, strong, special woman who had all the odds against her during her awful childhood, growing up years, and also about a wonderful black elderly couple, who also had all the odds against them, and they befriended and loved this poor young white girl any way, because the girl had no one that cared!
summary: A MOTHER SHOWING HER DAUGHTER  HER HIDDEN PAST!
Title: Chasing Secrets

reviewText: I could not find this movie anywhere in a store. It is a very goodlearning tool and very enjoyable to watch. Came as promised ontime in great shape. I will enjoy this over and over again.Will buy again from this vendor.
Title: Chasing Secrets

reviewText: Who would think that a successful writer would get her start from two elderly black surrogate parents?  Chasing Secrets is the type of movie that tears at your heartstrings.  Della Reese is excellent as "Honey" a woman who has lost her own child and she takes in this abused white girl who is forced, by her abusive grandfather to do things no 14 year old should have to face.  Ossie Davis is his usual loveable character and plays well opposite Della Reese.  Crystal Bernard's character is also played well, as the misguided young mother.  Get your tissue box out as this movie packs a powerful punch.  It's a great movie about possibilities.
Title: Chasing Secrets

reviewText: One of my favorite movies, and the story may be applicable to many of today's families. A well-to-do mother of two privileged teenage daughters finds them too prideful for her liking, so decides to show them their roots. She takes them to the place where she grew up, and tells them about the squalor and abuse of her own childhood--something they had previously known nothing about. The story unfolds about an elderly black couple who loved her, taught her, and gave her a chance at a real life. Warm, touching, and absorbing--and they do it without putting anything in that the whole family can't watch.
summary: If Della Reese is in it, it's going to be good
Title: Chasing Secrets
